title: How many dollars is equal to 1,000 quarters? - Quora

response.answer_text: 1 Quarter is 1/4th or 0.25 of a dollar (as 1/4 = 0.25). So, 1,000 quarters will be : 1000 * 0.25 = 250 Dollars OR As I mentioned above, 1 Quarter is 1/4th of a dollar. So, 1000 quarters will be : 1000*1/4 = 250 Dollars
